Name: The Norwegian Newspaper Corpus
Description:
This corpus contains articles from 24 Norwegian newspapers from 1998 onwards.
The corpus is available through the concordancer Corpuscle.

Name: Dagny
Description: This corpus contains articles from the newspaper Dagny from 1886 to 1913. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Corpus journalistique issu de l'Est Républicain
Description: This corpus contains articles from the French newspaper l'Est Républicain from 1999 to 2003. The corpus is available for download from Ortolang.

Name: Parallel Global Voices
Description: This corpus contains articles from the https://globalvoices.org/ website, where volunteers publish and translate news stories in more than 40 languages.

Name: Mannheim Corpus of Historical Newspapers and Magazines
Description:
This corpus contains articles from 21 German newspapers from the 18th and 19th century.
The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN-D repository.

Name: Rösträtt för Kvinnor
Description: This corpus contains articles from the newspaper Rösträtt för Kvinnor from 1912 to 1919. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Idun
Description: This corpus contains articles from the newspaper Idun from 1887 to 1917. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Poland
Description: This corpus contains 15,130 issues of 10 newspapers published in Poland between 1866 and 1939.

Name: Hertha
Description: This corpus contains articles from the newspaper Hertha from 1914 to 2015. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Germany
Description: This corpus contains 126,564 issues of 11 newspapers published in Germany (chiefly Berlin and Hamburg) between 1792 and 1945.

Name: TIGER Corpus
Description: This corpus contains articles from the German newspaper Frankfurter Rundschau. The corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpage.

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Finland
Description: This corpus contains 24,164 issues of 10 newspapers published in Finland between 1900 and 1910.

Name: The Karelian Finnish Newspaper Corpus
Description: This corpus contains articles from the Finnish newspaper Karjalan Sanomat from 2012 to 2014. The corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Name: The Newspaper and Periodical OCR Corpus of the National Library of Finland (1771-1874)
Description:
This corpus contains articles from a large variety of Finnish and Swedish newspapers (over 100 for each language) from 1771 to 1874.
The corpus can be downloaded from FIN-CLARIN.

Name: CRIPCO
Description: This corpus contains articles from the Italian newspaper L’Adige from 1999 to 2006. The corpus is available for download through META-SHARE.

Name: SYN2013PUB: corpus of written Czech newspapers
Description:
This corpus contains articles from Czech newspapers from 2005 to 2009.
The corpus  is available for download from the Czech repository LINDAT.

Name: DN 1987
Description: This corpus contains articles from the Swedish newspaper Dagens Nyheter from 1987. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Europeana Newspapers NER Corpora
Description: This corpus contains articles from Europeana newspapers for the following time periods: 1811-1856 for the Dutch subcorpus, 1871-1916 for the French subcorpus, and 1926 for the German subcorpus. The corpus is available for download from the KB Lab.

Name: 8 sidor
Description: This corpus contains articles from the Swedish newspaper 8 sidor from 2003 to 2012. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Corpus of Contemporary Serbian Newspapers and Magazines
Description: This corpus contains articles from over a 100 Serbian newspapers from 2004 to 2012.

Name: ACCURAT corpus of comparable sentences
Description:
This comparable corpus contains sentence pairs extracted from news comparable corpora.
The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.
Language pairs: English-Croatian, English- Greek, English-Estonian, English-Latvian, English-Lithuanian, English-Romanian, English-Slovenian, Greek-Romanian, Latvian-Lithuanian, Romanian-German, Romanian-Lithuanian and German-English

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Netherlands
Description: This corpus contains 4266 issues of 164 newspapers r published in the Netherlands between 1618 and 1940.

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Luxembourg
Description: This corpus contains 1225 issues of 2 newspapers published in Luxembourg between 1704 and 1794.

Name: Tübingen Treebank of Written German / Newspaper Corpus
Description: This corpus contains articles from the German newspaper Die Tageszeitung. The corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer with an institutional account.

Name: Couranten Corpus
Description:
This corpus contains thirteen seventeenth-century Dutch newspapers (altogether 109,532 articles) published between 1619 and 1700.
The corpus is available from the Dutch Language Institute.

Name: The Newspaper and Periodical Corpus of the National Library of Finland, Kielipankki Version
Description:
This corpus contains articles from a large variety of Finnish and Swedish newspapers (over 100 for each language) from 1770 to 2011.
The corpus can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Kvinnornas Tidning
Description: This corpus contains articles from the newspaper Kvinnornas Tidning for the period between 1921 and 1925. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: GP 1994 and 2001-2011
Description: This group of corpora contain articles from the Swedish newspaper Göteborgsposten from 1994 and from 2001 to  2011. The corpora are available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Modern Greek Texts Corpus - "Ta Nea" newspaper
Description:
This corpus contains newspaper articles in various topics (politics, economy, sports).
The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Serbia
Description: This corpus contains 22,087 issues of 44 newspapers published in Serbia between 1830 and 1944.

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Estonia
Description: This corpus contains 92,558 issues of 40 newspapers published in Estonia between 1852 and 1946.

Name: Timestamped JSI web corpus
Description:
This corpus contains articles from newsfeed from 2014 to 2017.
The corpus is available through noSketchEingine.

Name: Zurich English Newspaper Corpus
Description: This corpus contains articles from various English newspapers (mainly newspapers from London) from the 17th and 18th century.

Name: Smittskydd
Description: This corpus contains articles from the newspaper Smittskyd from 2002 to 2010. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Morgonbris
Description: This corpus contains articles from the newspaper Morgonbris from 1904 to 1924. The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Modern Greek Texts Corpus - "Makedonia" newspaper
Description:
This corpus contains newspaper articles in various topics (politics, economy, sports).
The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

Name: deu_newscrawl_2011
Description:
This corpus contains articles from various German newspapers from 2011.
The corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.

Name: "la Repubblica" corpus
Description: The corpus contains articles from the Italian newspaper La Repubblica. The corpus is available through the noSketch Engine concordancer.

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Latvia
Description: This corpus contains 67,870 issues of 77 newspapers published in Latvia between 1868 and 1955.

Name: SYN2006PUB: corpus of Czech newspapers
Description:
This corpus contains articles from 11 Czech newspapers from 1989 to 2004.
The corpus is available for download from the Czech repository LINDAT.

Name: SETIMES - A parallel corpus of the Balkan languages
Description: This parallel corpus contains online news articles extracted from the SETimes webpage. The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

Name: The image of Germany in the Greek press
Description: The corpus consists of newspaper articles from three Greek newspapers (Ta Nea, Risospastis, and To Vima) dealing with Germany from the Greek perspective. Bibliographical information is encoded in the path to the file: It is composed of title of the newspaper, year, month, day, and rubric. The lemmata are stored in a separate tree of the same structure, the text files in that tree contain one lemma per line. The corpus is available for download from CLARIN-D (Saarland University B-centre).

Name: Europeana historical newspapers: Austria
Description: This corpus contains 147,515 issues of 77 newspapers published in Austria between 1683 and 1930.

Name: The Webbnyheter corpus
Description:
This corpus contains articles from various Swedish online newspapers from 2001 to 2013.
The corpus is available for download from Språkbanken and can be accessed through the concordancer Korp.

Name: Corpus VU-DNC
Description:
This corpus consists of data from five newspapers, covering 3 separate years (1950, 1951, and 2002).
The corpus is available from the Dutch Language Institute.

Name: Corpus "Library and Information Centre - Newspapers"
Description:
The corpus contains newspaper articles.
The corpus is available for download from the CLARIN:EL repository.

Name: Wablieft Corpus
Description: This corpus contains the digital archive of the Wablieft newspaper from 2011 to 2017. The corpus is available from the Dutch Language Institute.

Name: WAI-NOT Corpus
Description: This corpus contains the digital archive of the WAI-NOT newspaper between 2009 and 2021. The corpus is available from the Dutch Language Institute.

Name: ChronoPress Corpus of Polish Press Texts
Description:
This corpus contains articles from various Polish newspapers from 1945 and 1962.
The corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.

Name: WItaC - NewsReader Wikinews Italian Corpus
Description:
This corpus contains Italian translations of 120 English Wikinews articles.
The corpus is available for download from a dedicated website.
Annotation: entities, events, event factuality, temporal information, semantic roles, and intra-document and cross-document event and entity coreference
